dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Who dares to disturb the tranquility of the earth?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek passage through this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Passage? None shall pass without facing the wrath of the Stone Guardian.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no harm, I seek only to pass peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful or not, all intruders must face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will take my chances and proceed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, you shall regret your decision.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will retreat and leave this place be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coward! Run while you still can.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not here to fight, I respect the guardians of this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? Your words hold no weight in the eyes of the earth.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then allow me to prove my sincerity through a gesture of peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Gestures matter little to the stone, actions speak louder.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand, I will turn back and leave in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice, flee before the earth's anger consumes you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge the Stone Guardian to a test of strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a mere mortal. Let the earth decide your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I accept the challenge and will prove my worth.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery or foolishness? Time will tell.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I reconsider, this was a jest. No need for such conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A jest? The earth does not take kindly to jests.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking knowledge of this realm's history.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge-seeker, yet you disturb the earth's slumber.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer a token of respect in exchange for your wisdom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? Material possessions mean nothing to the stone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then I will leave, not wanting to cause further disturbance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave and trouble the earth no more, for your own sake.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stay and listen, showing my sincerity in seeking understanding.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn mortal, your curiosity may be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for the disturbance, I will leave if that is your wish.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies cannot undo the disruption caused by your presence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, I will depart and trouble you no further.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Depart quickly, lest the earth's fury be unleashed upon you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to leave until I learn what I seek, I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Persistence may lead to peril in the realm of the Stone Guardian.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge the Stone Guardian to a battle of wits.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A battle of wits? You amuse the earth with your audacity.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Indeed, let us match our intellects and see who prevails.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Intellect is but one aspect of the earth's strength.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am ready to prove my mental prowess, let the challenge begin.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Words alone will not impress the earth.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see you are not interested, I will take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise choice, retreat before your mind is outmatched.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I admit, I am no match for the wisdom of the Stone Guardian.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Acknowledgement of your limits does not exempt you from consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand, I will leave and trouble you no further.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understand quickly, for the earth's patience wears thin.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stay and listen, perhaps I can learn something from you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity may lead to downfall in the face of the stone's judgement.
